item.title: Chili Plant Monitor
item.description: After moving desks around the turn of the year into a new room with windows, a bit of a rarity at CriticalBlue, a colleague and I decided it was time to add some greenery to our, at this point, boring corner office. The obvious thing to grow was a bunch of chili plants! Amazon provided me with a pack of easy to grow Apache F1 seeds, some pots and a bag of compost.
